Tip of the Day
The base chance to find most Chests is 1/250, which you can increase with better gear and tools.

Cape of the trailblazer

From Walkscape Walkthrough

Cape of the trailblazer
Rarity:
Type: Loot
Slot: Cape
Value: 0
Search
Keywords: 		Global
Traveling
Properties:
Bankable:     Droppable:
Sellable:     Tradable:

This cape is a symbol of the trailblazer's courage and determination, promising that wherever it's worn, tales of daring escapades are sure to follow.

The Cape of the trailblazer item is a loot item.

Requirements

This item has no requirements to use it.

Attributes

+20% Work efficiency While traveling.
Global +25% Fine material finding
Global +1 Inventory space
-3 Steps required While traveling.
Global +25 Quality outcome
Global +15% Find collectibles
Global +1.5% Chance to find 1 Adventurers' guild token

Uses

This item may be equipped to your character.

Sources

Shop Purchases

Shop Name Location Region Item Type Stock Price
Adventurers' Guild Outpost Horn of Respite Jarvonia 1 2,500
Adventurers' Guild Swampost Halfmaw Hideout GDTE 1 2,500
